data.title: Bigg Boss fame Rahul Mahajan and wife Natalya Ilina all set to be a part of Star Plus' upcoming show 'Smart Jodi'
data.meta_description: Star Plus is coming up with an off-beat reality show concept titled 'Smart Jodi'. The viewers will witness 10 celebrity couples coming together to explore
data.text:
Star Plus is coming up with an off-beat reality show concept titled ‘Smart Jodi’. The viewers will witness 10 celebrity couples coming together to explore the dynamics of their relationship through the show. The latest couple to join the list is Rahul Mahajan and his wife Natalya Ilina.

Rahul Mahajan, who rose to fame with his stint in Bigg Boss 2 has been a part of several television reality shows. has had an exciting life. Rahul was first seen in ‘Bigg Boss 2’ and since then he has been making appearances on the show in almost every season.

Rahul also had a swayamvar show in his name titled Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega. The reality show was a sequel to Rakhi Ka Swayamwar. Rahul married Dimpy Ganguly from the show and the wedding was shown on national television. Before Dimpy, Rahul was married to Shweta Singh. Rahul’s marriage with Dimpy didn’t last long and he then tied the knot for the third time with Natalya Ilina in 2018. Natalya is an ethnic Russian Kazakh model.

Along with Rahul Mahajan and Natalya, popular YouTuber Gaurav Taneja and Ritu Rathi have also been roped in for the show.
